results.name: Triangle read by rows: row n lists all partitions of n in the order produced by the shell model of partitions A138151.
comment: See the integrated diagram of partitions in the entry A138138.
link: Robert Price, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..7043, 17 rows.
mathematica: Cases[IntegerPartitions[n], x_ /; Last[x] != 1]]], {i, 7}, {n, i, 1, -1}]  // Flatten(* _Robert Price_, May 28 2020 *)
